text: Gulliver Mickey is a black and white short cartoon in the Mickey Mouse series. It was produced by Walt Disney and released by United Artists in 1934. It was the 66th Mickey Mouse short film to be released, and the fourth of that year. ==Voice cast== * Mickey Mouse: Walt Disney * Pluto: Pinto Colvig * Mickey's Nephews: unknown * Giant Spider: Clarence Nash ==Home media== The short was released on December 2, 2002, on Walt Disney Treasures: Mickey Mouse in Black and White. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Disney animated movies
title: Gulliver Mickey
